function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Limited attention to public responses to the government's actions","Impact":"Potential lack of compliance with protective behaviors","Mitigation":"Conducting research on public behavior and developing effective communication strategies","Technologies":"Survey tools, data analytics platforms","People":"Chinese citizens, general public","Owner":"Government, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Dearth of literature documenting public protective behaviors in China","Impact":"Lack of understanding of public behavior during the COVID-19 outbreak","Mitigation":"Conducting studies on public knowledge and attitudes, following CDC guidelines","Technologies":"Data collection tools, survey platforms","People":"Chinese citizens, public health researchers","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Late endorsement of face mask usage in the US and some European countries","Impact":"Potential increase in transmission of SARS-CoV-2","Mitigation":"Public education on the effectiveness of face masks, policy implementation","Technologies":"Public health communication platforms, policy enforcement tools","People":"General public in the US and Europe","Owner":"Health authorities, government"}]}
